name: Element Craft
description:
Welcome!

This beta game is the classic minigame in which you merge elements to create new ones.

By now we only have a beta version ending on Sapiens, but we are currently working in lots of improvements. Our goal is to make a more realistic and scientist approach.

Coming soon:
-More elements
-Time recipes (currently 0)
-Save game option
-Multiple recipes for the same element

Future Biggest Updates:
-Element Images Update
-Different Merge Machines Update
